TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CookieProtection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes how information in a cookie is protected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.CookieProtection All = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Use both Validation and Encryption to protect the information in the cookie.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.CookieProtection Encryption = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Encrypt the information in the cookie.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.CookieProtection None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Do not protect information in the cookie. Information in the cookie is stored in clear text and not validated when sent back to the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.CookieProtection Validation = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Ensure that the information in the cookie has not been altered before being sent back to the server.
